Name: Locke(d)
About the game: You wake up sitting across from a beautiful stranger. 'There is nothing I want more than to talk to you right now.' And so you talk. Locke(d) is a short, mysterious and atmospheric visual novel with brief point-and-click segments. Linear visual novel ~3000 words 10-30 minutes of reading The game was originally made within 2 weeks, and was heavily inspired by a passage in John Locke's 'An Essay Concerning Human Understanding' .
